segments.text: I'm just watching this scene unfold, it's quite something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely lost in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate with such intense focus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water, oh my, it's gushing over the sink's edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It forms a clear sheet, spilling onto the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And there's a growing puddle right at her feet!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One foot is already submerged, yet she shows no sign of noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains utterly calm and composed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astonishing how oblivious someone can be to immediate surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I almost want to shout a warning to her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to cause a lot of damage to that kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the floor must be getting so slippery by now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She just keeps polishing that plate, unaware of the rising tide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a peculiar sight, this domestic calm amidst a minor disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
